DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the effect of a 2-stage approach to the internal jugular vein when performing a central venous catheterization compared to the traditional one stage approach on the incidence of hematoma formation and success rate.
DOC.brief_title: The 2-stage Approach for Reducing Posterior Wall Puncture During the Internal Jugular Vein Catheterization
DOC.criteria: Patients who require a central venous catheter for their thoracic surgery Refuse to enroll Infection at insertion site Carotid artery disease Anomaly of central vasculature Hypertrophied thyroid History of recent neck surgery
